data.eml:eml: New species and records of Chimarra (Trichoptera, Philopotamidae) from Northeastern Brazil, and an updated key to subgenus Chimarra (Chimarrita)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vilarino, Albane, Calor, Adolfo Ricardo (2015): New species and records of Chimarra (Trichoptera, Philopotamidae) from Northeastern Brazil, and an updated key to subgenus Chimarra (Chimarrita). ZooKeys 491: 119-142, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.491.8553, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.491.8553
